meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Susan Thurman Alison Burke Matt Jackson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7143.

td.p: Susan Thurman, a scholarship program director from Tucker, Georgia
Alison Burke, a tutor from Brooklyn, New York
Matt Jackson, a paralegal from Washington, D.C. (whose 8-day cash winnings total $230,610)

tr.td: THE PRESIDENT WHO...
ALBUM CUTS
I PREDICT YOU'RE WRONG
THE ART OF DANCE
FALL HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
ON "FIRE"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[After the Final Jeopardy! Round, a brief promo plays.]
(Peabody: To convince Alex Trebek that the world adores him more with facial hair, Sherman and I set the WABAC to 2698 B.C.E., China, for Alex to try...)
(Sherman: The Fu Manchu!)
(Alex: Watch Jeopardy! with special guests Mr. Peabody and Sherman!)
(Announcer: Tomorrow on Jeopardy!)
SusanWho is Raiders of Lost Ark?
$2,300
AlisonWho is Indiana Jones?
$7,996
MattWho is Indiana Jones
$1,406
Indiana Jones')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
